rtbrick.com | Software Engineer | Dev-test| Routing | Forwarding | Bangalore, India | ONSITE | Full-time

Rtbrick is a well funded seed stage startup with a mission to enable seamless interaction between the application and the network through modular and scalable routing software. Our approach towards networks is based on building modular and distributed software running on commodity hardware like whitebox switches and off the shelf servers.

Join us on this exciting journey to build world class software from our Bangalore development centre.
